page.title: 18CHELTENHAM RACECOURSE
page.content: THE{CHELTENHAM RACECOURSE}AT{PRESTBURY {PARK}SEES{NATIONAL HUNT HORSERACING DURING THE WINTER MONTHS. THE {CHELTENHAM GOLD CUP}MEET IS THE HIGHLIGHT OF THE NATIONAL HUNT YEAR, VERY POPULAR WITH THE{IRISH RACING {ENTHUSIASTS}WHO COME ACROSS IN LARGE NUMBERS. THE{GOLD CUP WEEK}IS THE {BUSIEST WEEK}FOR CHELTENHAM THROUGHOUT THE YEAR WITH HOTELS COMPLETELY FULL AND RESTAURANTS AND BARS ENJOYING GREATLY INCREASED CUSTOM. THE {PRESTBURY PARK SUITE}CAN BE HIRED FOR WEDDING RECEPTIONS AND OTHER LARGE FUNCTIONS. THE RACECOURSE SITE IS ALSO HOST TO{A VARIETY OF OTHER EVENTS THROUGH THE YEAR SUCH AS FIREWORK DISPLAYS, VISITING CIRCUSES, LARGE OUTDOOR ENTERTAINMENTS AND A WEEKLY SUNDAY MARKET.
